title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (CLF-C02)
summary: Foundational AWS cloud concepts, core services, security, pricing, and support — a recommended first step.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate (SAA-C03)
summary: Designing fault-tolerant, cost-efficient, and scalable distributed systems on AWS.

title: AWS Certified Developer – Associate (DVA-C02)
summary: Developing, deploying and debugging cloud applications; SDKs and CI/CD on AWS.

title: AWS Certified SysOps Administrator / CloudOps Engineer – Associate
summary: Cloud operations, monitoring, incident management and administration (SysOps / CloudOps). Note: AWS has been transitioning SysOps to CloudOps — check AWS for current exam code and dates.

title: AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate (DEA-C01)
summary: Ingest, transform and orchestrate data pipelines using AWS data services (role-based data associate).

title: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer – Associate (MLA-C01)
summary: Associate-level ML engineering knowledge: basic model building, evaluation and deployment patterns (role-specific associate).

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional (SAP-C02)
summary: Advanced cloud architecture, migration, and optimization of complex solutions at scale.

title: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer – Professional (DOP-C02)
summary: Automation, CI/CD, reliability engineering and operational excellence for AWS workloads.

title: AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty (MLS-C01)
summary: Building, training, tuning and deploying machine learning models and end-to-end ML pipelines on AWS. (Note: AWS shows retirement timelines for some specialty exams; check official AWS page for updates.)

title: AWS Certified Security – Specialty (SCS-C02)
summary: Designing and implementing security controls, data protection, and governance on AWS.

title: AWS Certified Advanced Networking – Specialty (ANS-C01)
summary: Complex networking tasks, hybrid connectivity, and advanced AWS networking services.

title: AWS Certified Data Analytics – Specialty (DAS-C01)
summary: Designing and implementing analytics solutions using AWS data services (analytics & visualization pipelines).

title: AWS Certified Database – Specialty (DBS-C01)
summary: Designing, operating and optimizing AWS database solutions (relational, non-relational, and analytics DBs).

title: Other / Role-based AWS Certifications
summary: AWS periodically adds role-based and specialty certifications (e.g., cloud ops, generative AI dev, and role-specific associate certs). Check the official AWS Certification site for the latest additions & retirement notices.
